title: I'd like to read about Frederick Douglass, what book would you recommend? - Quora
tags: History of the United States of America

response.answer_text: I would recommend his own memoir/autobiography Narrative of the Life of Frederick Douglass, an American Slave. It details specific details and events such as how and by whom he was conceived, where he learned to read, and other occurrences that led to his success as an African American abolitionist during the era of U.S. slavery.
